title: Artist Profile: Elif Aybuke Kocak
body:
Elif Aybuke Kocak’s acid dropping, gluten free, roided up Disney stoner paintings.

Simpler than that sentence but just as entertaining.

#gallery-1 { margin: auto; } #gallery-1 .gallery-item { float: left; margin-top: 10px; text-align: center; width: 33%; } #gallery-1 img { border: 2px solid #cfcfcf; } #gallery-1 .gallery-caption { margin-left: 0; } /\* see gallery\_shortcode() in wp-includes/media.php \*/

[![](https://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/07/mickey-the-hot-dog-mouth.--150x150.jpg)](https://admin.crackintheroad.com/arts/22970-artist-profile-elif-aybuke-kocak/attachment/mickey-the-hot-dog-mouth)

[![](https://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/07/STEROID-OVERDOSE-paintings.-3-150x150.jpg)](https://admin.crackintheroad.com/arts/22970-artist-profile-elif-aybuke-kocak/attachment/steroid-overdose-paintings-3)

[![](https://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/07/STEROID-OVERDOSE-paintings.--150x150.jpg)](https://admin.crackintheroad.com/arts/22970-artist-profile-elif-aybuke-kocak/attachment/steroid-overdose-paintings)

  

[![](https://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/07/babu-the-gluten-free--150x150.jpg)](https://admin.crackintheroad.com/arts/22970-artist-profile-elif-aybuke-kocak/attachment/babu-the-gluten-free)

[![](https://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/07/Marilize-Leguana-painting--150x150.jpg)](https://admin.crackintheroad.com/arts/22970-artist-profile-elif-aybuke-kocak/attachment/marilize-leguana-painting)

[![](https://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/07/donald-the-hot-dog-mouth.--150x150.jpg)](https://admin.crackintheroad.com/arts/22970-artist-profile-elif-aybuke-kocak/attachment/donald-the-hot-dog-mouth)

  

More [here](http://babacimbanayumusakkuzuciz.tumblr.com/).
